reviews.review: Very Good Game If you team mates aren't fking retards and know how the game works. Buy it if you have friends...

这游戏体验挺好的，就是游戏体验很差。
制作组修bug也挺快的，就是从来不修。

[h1] 보는게 더 재미있는 게임 [/h1]

하는 것보다 보는게 더 재미있는 게임
초보자가 하기엔 그만큼 숙련도 올리는데 오랜 시간이 걸린다.
분명 트위치보고 재밌겠다하고 하면 벌레컷 당하는 본인을 볼 수 있다.

Después de +350h puedo decir que es un juego que está muy desbalanceado, pero que aún así es muy divertido y consigue que vuelvas a jugar una y otra vez. Al principio puede parecer muy difícil y, de hecho, para aprender a jugar y conocer todas las perks es necesario acudir a algún streamer/youtuber, pero una vez que aprendes resulta muy satisfactorio loopear hasta que tu equipo haga 3/4 motores o hacer 4 kills sin que te hagan motores.
high rank players do not interact ever

Откровенно говоря, лагающее днище, шо у меня слов нет, раньше как-то лучше работало. Сейчас не работают базовые механики и многие работают не так как надо, я бы рекомендовал воздержаться от покупки данного продукта капиталистического происхождения, лучше поиграйте в "Мафию" с друзьями или "Stardew Valley". Серьёзно, на данный момент, эта игра рассадник токсичности и наплевательского отношения разработчиков, дело ваше, но я предупредил.
被溜很有意思，体验很好【狗头
Gra jest nawet fajna ale ma sporo problemów z hitboxami itp.
好游戏，就是拔皇太多，几局连着杀手挂机，要不就是队友拔线，哎。
Esta bueno el juegito pero hay algunos toxicos pero despues es bastante tranqui las primras partidas no vas a entender nada pero a medida que vas jugando mejoras un monton
Интересная игра, пойдет чтобы поиграть с друзьями, хорошо провести время, но долго в нее играть невозможно, надаедает, но все таки стоит своих щекелей. луйк
It's genuinly pretty tense and spooky
Muito divertido para jogar com amigos, recomendo muito, foi uma experiencia incrivel!
妈的傻逼游戏，玩个5把3把都同步错误，坑血点，玩你妈比
Great game. Really fun to play with friends. Definitely recommend.
Awesome game with a cancerous community.
只要胆子大 屠夫拉下马

The base gameplay is quite elegant and satisfying, but the the grinding is completely useless to the experience and extremely tedious. The game would also benefit having multiple game modes to make it less repetitive, but yea, that's not gonna happen :)

________
I changed my recommendation to positive, as I had fun playing the game during the time I spent on it. I was just disappointed by the repetitiveness of the gameplay, probably a feeling induced by the fact I was going to have to grind a lot to enjoy playing with high level perks.
This game is cardio for when you're too lazy for actual cardio.
角色技能有華麗，故事背景有吸引力。模組特效精緻
Jogo maravilhoso, porem os killers tem muito mais beneficios que os sobreviventes e tambem tem a questao do dead hard nunca funcionar, por favor arrumem pelo menos o Dead Hard pra ficar melhor.
游戏出这么多年了，服务器依旧垃圾

- Jogo Bugado

A comunidade é puro césio, o jogo é super bugado e só me faz passar raiva
Recomendo caso você se odeie

This is so much fun! I was very frightened when learning how to play with a friend...but then I played it again and fell in love! I love to unwind after a long day with DBD. It's like a dose of adrenaline and also relieves stress because I'm focused on particular goals. If you're a horror fan, I hope you'll love this game too!
В этой игре можно хорошо зависнуть с друзьями
camping sucks but its much fun

jest super, moge grac ze znajomymi. gram Dziadygą w sweterku z helipopterem z moimi przyjaciolmi. Laurella gra nikim a Tytka Neą (ktora jest bytem btw). Ogolnei chillera, fajnie sie gra i ocalalym, ale lubie odskoczyc od normy i raz na jakis czas pozabijac podrobki billa
Melhor jogo pra desestressar das rankeadas da rito gomes
10/10 would get left to die on first hook again.
good game i have lot hours
Cheio de bugs, mas a gente ama e passa pano e joga todo dia, então a gente ama.
güzel bir oyun ama bence tek sıkıntısı katilleri first person oynamak hiç sevmedim o kısmı keşke 13.cumadaki gibi third person olsaydı ama yinede okey
insanely fun and creative game. Much better than it looks.
the game is great, even the bugs are funny af
Tek oynayınca çok yoran ama arkadaşlarla oynandıgında 10 numara oyun.
Mesmo com os bugs o jogo ainda é muito bom!

Polecam serdecznie. Jak chcesz możesz grać ocalałym a jeśli przyjaciele cię wykiwali lub jesteś sam, rola zabójcy bedzię idealna dla ciebie. Społeczność może być trochę toxic ale polecam nie przejmować się nimi i po prostu dobrze się bawić.

şu tavşan maskeli balta atan karekter olduğu sürece bu oyuna notum -100 dür. oyundaki bütün katiller yakıncı yani melee silahlara sahipken bu arkadaşımız itici ninni sesi dahil uzaktan habire fırlatabildiği baltasıyla oyun zevkinizin içine edebilir . Sıkıntı  tek ranged karekter bu karekter onun dışında karekterlerin hepsi melee .Ya bu karekteri oyundan kaldırır ya da bütün karekterleri ranged yaparsınız.
Very nice Game. A big variety of Killers and Maps keep the game exiting even after 200 playing hours.
Melhor que dar a bunda tonigranadinha aprova
so precisa arrruma alguns problemas, mais fora isso o  jogoo e muito bom
4年以上も前のゲームなんですね！

C'est un très bon jeu de coopération y jouer avec un ami me semble la base.
Très fun et même un laptop avec une patate en guise de carte graphique (comme mon PC) peux faire tourner ce jeu
